thread.section_title: Munchery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Munchery | www.munchery.com
thread.title: Denise Rust

author: Denise Rust
title: Denise Rust
text: My husband and I ordered the Chicken, Mushroom and Farro Risotto. We were thrilled with the taste of it and the portion size. Delivery was on time. The meal was literally five minutes to make. I heated it up by putting the risotto over the chicken breast so it would not dry out the chicken and it was perfect. I did add some roasted Brussel sprouts of my own to get a little more green in the meal but we could have easily gone without it and been "filled". I will be ordering again.
